name: showRSS mobile
body:
### Welcome to Show RSS Mobile on Github
This is a native android interface to the fantastic [showRSS](http://showrss.karmorra.info/) website. This is an unoffical 3rd party app, the developers have no association with the showrss.kamorra.info website.

showRSS is a service that allows you to keep track of your favorite TV shows. You pick your favorite shows from the list, then you subscribe to your feed. You can subscribe with your torrent client, so latest episodes are automatically downloaded, or add the feed to your browser or feed reader if you want to keep track of latest torrents. Other features also include tracking of your show schedule, so you know exactly when a new episode will air.

### Getting the Android app
* [showRSS mobile app](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.showrss)

### Vote up ideas for future releases
* [Development board](https://trello.com/board/showrss-mobile/4f86e7d12d7dbd757c199026)
tagline: Android App for the fantastic http://showrss.karmorra.info/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
